attributes.action: Abandon Westminster and adopt Leyton Orient's West Stand facilities as the seat of British Politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the 2012 Olympic Games approaches, the East End is a recognised area of regeneration. It is also an inner city, multi-cultural environment which would bring main-stream politics to the people.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
